00020 #ifndef _FILE5_SQLITE_H_
00021 #define _FILE5_SQLITE_H_
00022 
00023 //
00024 #include "file5/File5.h"
00025 //
00026 #include "sqlite3.h"
00027 //
00028 #include <string>
00029 
00030 /**
00031  * Helper class to hold the various options for
00032  * converting file5 files to sqlite databases.
00033  */
00034 class File5_Sqlite_Config {
00035 
00036 public:
00037 
00038   File5_Sqlite_Config() {
00039     numeric = "real";
00040   }
00041 
00042   /// If this column is seen in the file5 table make it the primary column
00043   std::string primaryColumn;
00044   /// Name of the database table to be created. Generally file5_tsv name by default.
00045   std::string tableName;
00046   /// Precision to use for floating point, default is "real" but could do "numeric(4,5)" as example
00047   std::string numeric;
00048 
00049 };
00050 
00051 /**
00052  * Class with some utility functions for converting File5 files
00053  * into sqlite databases for analysis. Currently static libraries to
00054  * be used by other programs.
00055  */
00056 class File5_Sqlite {
00057   
00058 public:
00059   
00060   /** 
00061    * Use the column definitions in the File5 definition to create a table in sqlite database
00062    * 
00063    * @param db - Open connection to the sqlite database where table will be created.
00064    * @param tsv5 - File5_Tsv pointer which will be read to create column definitions.
00065    * @param config - Various configurations to make the table like table name, and primary column name
00066    */
00067   static void copySchema(sqlite3 *db, affx::File5_Tsv *tsv5, File5_Sqlite_Config &config);
00068   
00069 
00070   /** 
00071    * Fill in an sqlite databse table with the data in the File5_Tsv table
00072    * 
00073    * @param db - Open connection to the sqlite database data will be inserted
00074    * @param tsv5 - File5_Tsv pointer which will be read for data
00075    * @param config - Various configurations to insert the data like table name etc.
00076    */
00077   static void copyData(sqlite3 *db, affx::File5_Tsv *tsv5, File5_Sqlite_Config &config);
00078   
00079 private:
00080 
00081   /** 
00082    * Helper function to make an sql statement that will replicated the File5_Tsv table in 
00083    * sql database.
00084    * 
00085    * @param tsv5 - File with data definition.
00086    * @param primaryColumn - What is the name, if any, of the primary column
00087    * @param tableName - Name of the table to be created
00088    * @param numeric - Sql specification for real numbers (eg numeric(4,3))
00089    * @param createSql - String where sql will be filled in.
00090    */
00091   static void makeCreateStatement(affx::File5_Tsv *tsv5, const std::string &primaryColumn,
00092                                   const std::string &tableName, const std::string &numeric,
00093                                   std::string &createSql);
00094   
00095   /** 
00096    * Helper function to exectue a particular piece of sql in the sqlite database. Not as efficient
00097    * as prepared statements as every call prepares a statement, steps through it and finalizes it.
00098    * Usefule for insert, create table, etc. where no results are expected.
00099    * 
00100    * @param db - Open connection to sqlite database.
00101    * @param sql - Sql to be run by the database.
00102    */
00103   static void execute(sqlite3 *db, const std::string &sql);
00104     
00105 };
00106 
00107 #endif /* _FILE5_SQLITE_H_ */
